bug.author: jorothe
bug.description: Hi, I use Carla to generate datasets for semantic segmentation and only need the sensor data of every xth tick. Thus i make use of the sensor attribute sensor_tick and set it to 1 or 2 (seconds). The sensors camera.rgb, camera.semantic_segmentation and camera.depth seem to ignore the sensor_tick attribute and return data in every tick. The sensors camera.dvs or lidar.ray_cast for example are behaving as expected. I am using Carla 0.9.10[.1] on Windows.
